TOP.INTRO: UNCHAIN is a grassroots community of web3 engineers, turning to their ideas into reality.

PROJECTS.1: Hands-on tutorials to help you understand how to build dApps on public blockchains.

1.HEADING: Project-Based Learning
1.DESCRIPTION: Gain practical development skills in smart contracts and web applications through a wide range of hands-on, project based tutorials.

2.HEADING: Community Growth
2.DESCRIPTION: Find other people with similar passions, and share ideas with each other for mutual growth.

3.HEADING: Open-Source
3.DESCRIPTION: Anyone can see and verify our projects, and even contribute to it themselves. Everything is provided free and to the public.
